{"id":527433689,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1627116313,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/527433689/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"89.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {\n        int i=0,j=0,l1=nums1.size(),l2=nums2.size();\n        vector<double>v(l1+l2);\n        for(int k=0;k<l1+l2;k++){\n            if(j>=l2 || (i<l1 && nums1[i]<=nums2[j])) v[k]=nums1[i++];\n            else v[k]=nums2[j++];\n        }\n        int n=(l1+l2)/2;\n        if((l1+l2)%2==0){\n            int m=n-1;\n            return (v[n]+v[m])/2.0;\n        }\n        else return v[n];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays"}
